meanings.definition: A rare type of eye cancer that begins in the retina of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The doctors diagnosed the child with retinoblastomas after noticing unusual symptoms in the eye.
meanings.sent2: The hospital specializes in treating retinoblastomas in young patients.
meanings.sent3: The retinoblastomas decided to throw a party in the eye, inviting all the cells to join in the celebration.
meanings.sent4: The retinoblastomas spread like wildfire, consuming the eye with their destructive growth.
meanings.sent5: The image of the retinoblastomas invading the eye was both terrifying and unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: The research study focused on analyzing various cases of retinoblastomas to understand the disease better.
meanings.sent2: The doctors discussed the treatment options for the retinoblastomas affecting both eyes of the patient.
meanings.sent3: At the eye clinic, the retinoblastomas lined up in pairs, ready to be examined by the specialists.
meanings.sent4: The retinoblastomas in the children's ward were like tiny warriors fighting a battle within the eyes.
meanings.sent5: The classroom presentation included a detailed illustration of retinoblastomas to educate the students about eye health.
